summary: Various fixes I\'ve made to add more options to popular files
descriptionHtml:
Here are some of my changes to popular mods to add more options I though they could use. All credits go to their original authors.

[size=16]EACH PATCH REQUIRES THE ORIGINAL MOD[/size]


[heading][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29259/]Expanded Bound Weapons[/url][/heading]
Removed the custom enchants and just left the new Bound spell types such as Greatsword and Pickaxe. Also removed Bound Dagger spell for compatibility with Dragonborn.

[heading][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/98/]KenMOD - Time on loading screen[/url][/heading]
Changes the display of time at 12:xx to 12:xx instead of 0:xx when 12 hour time is enabled.

[heading][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18867/]Ragdoll mod by Hellmaker[/url][/heading]
Restored sword position from back to character\'s side like in vanilla.

[heading][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20773/]Smaller Kingthings Petrock fonts[/url][/heading]
[b]Also used in Requiem[/b]
Added characters \'[\' and \']\' to character set to prevent rectangles from showing in menus/descriptions in place of said characters.



[b]Credits[/b]
\"Ragdoll mod by Hellmaker\" uploaded by tes4world
\"Smaller Kingthings Petrock fonts\" uploaded by Eckhart
\"KenMOD - Time on loading screen\" uploaded by Kenney
\"Expanded Bound Weapons including Bound Shields v2_1\" uploaded by warden01
author: myztikrice
